meanings.definition: An account of someone's life written by someone else.
meanings.sent1: I read a biography about a famous scientist.
meanings.sent2: She decided to write a biography of her favorite author.
meanings.sent3: The biography of the cat written by the dog was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her biography of the mountain climber was a thrilling adventure.
meanings.sent5: The biography painted a vivid picture of the artist's struggles and triumphs.

meanings.definition: The story of a person's life written by that person.
meanings.sent1: The autobiography detailed her journey to success.
meanings.sent2: He wanted to share his experiences through his autobiography.
meanings.sent3: The autobiography of the tree written by the squirrel was quite interesting.
meanings.sent4: His autobiography of survival in the wilderness was a powerful tale.
meanings.sent5: The autobiography revealed the author's innermost thoughts and feelings.
